Instance.description: The Sim creates an crafting object(bowl/tray/frypan) on the slot of the target object(counter/stove), this interaction will also run an animation to do a transition about sim switch from current crafting object to the new crafting object

TunableVariant.name: apply_final_states_xevt_id
TunableVariant.description: Event ID at which the new ICO will have its final state changes applied.

Tunable.name: use_custom_event_id
Tunable.description: Event ID at which the new ICO will have its final state changes applied.
